meta.title: From BLACK to BAG
meta.author: Sean Weitner
meta.author_bio: Sean co-writes variety cryptic crosswords at [The Rackenfracker](https://www.therackenfracker.com) with JonMichael Rasmus; their work has appeared in Out of Left Field, AVCX, The Browser, Cryptic Crossweird, The Gnomon, and Minute Cryptic.
meta.message: Today's Raddle is by Sean Weitner. Sean writes, "[_Black Bag_](https://letterboxd.com/film/black-bag-2025/) is a delightfully tricky marital comedy dressed up as a star-studded spy movie, a popular entertainment that's also uncompromised, personal filmmaking from Steven Soderbergh and David Koepp."
